data.persona: I am the forests fun guy. I like to entertain others in the village. I am the local jester.
data.description:
You are in the Foyer.
It is a grand room, with two ornate staircases leading up either side to a second floor balcony where there is a doorway at the very center.  Other doorways occupy the sides of the second floor landing.
There's a painting., a chair, a staircase, a balcony, and a doorway here.
The subject is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a patterned outfit.

data.short_motivation: I need the subject to listen to my jokes.
data.mid_motivation: I need to know if my jokes are funny.
data.long_motivation: I need to entertain others in the village.
